column1: Flow ID,Name,Description,Test Steps,Flow Priority

1,View and Verify Phone Category Page,"Navigate to the home page, click on the phone category link, select a specific phone by title, and verify the phone category page.","Step 1: Navigate to https://cellphone-staging.aut.katalon.com/
Step 2: Click on link 'Phone' -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
Step 3: Click on link 'By title'
Step 4: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

,High
2,Purchase Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra Smartview Case,Navigate to the home page, select accessories, choose a specific Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra Smartview case, add to cart, proceed to checkout, provide shipping information, and continue to shipping.","Step 1: Navigate to https://cellphone-staging.aut.katalon.com/
Step 2: Hover over list item
Step 3: Click on link 'Accessories' -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
Step 4: Click on link  -> Navigate to page 'product/*'
Step 5: Click on button 'Buy'
Step 6: Click on link 'Place an order' -> Navigate to page 'cart'
Step 7: Click on button 'Proceed to checkout' -> Navigate to page 'checkout/info'
Step 8: Hover over div
Step 9: Click on input field 'email'
Step 10: Click on button 'CONTINUE TO SHIPPING'

,Medium
3,Purchase Apple Accessories and Complete Order,Navigate to the home page, select Apple category, browse accessories, add items to cart, proceed to checkout, fill shipping details, proceed to payment, and complete the order.","Step 1: Navigate to https://cellphone-staging.aut.katalon.com
Step 2: Hover over list item
Step 3: Click on link 'Phone' -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
Step 4: Hover over list item
Step 5: Click on link 'Apple'
Step 6: Hover over list item
Step 7: Click on link 'Accessories'
Step 8: Click on button 'Add to cart'
Step 9: Click on link 'Go to cart' -> Navigate to page 'cart'
Step 10: Click on link 'Go to cart'
Step 11: Fill shipping address details and proceed to payment
